item.title: The Inherent Strangeness of Trump’s Executive Order on Flag-Burning
item.description: Typically, presidents who push the constitutional envelope like to insist that they are doing no such thing. Here, that instinct has been reversed.

item.title: The Myth That Democrats ‘Go High’ Is in Desperate Need of Busting
item.description: Nate Silver seems somehow unfamiliar with the decade of remorseless political warfare waged by Democrats. Here’s a refresher.

item.title: The Key Detail in Trump’s Attempt to Fire a Fed Governor
item.description: He is technically adhering to Congress’s rules for the Federal Reserve, regardless of whether his motives are pure.

item.title: At Least You’re Not Ken Martin
item.description: The Democratic Party’s problems run even deeper than its operational headaches.

item.title: Ozempic, Wegovy, Mounjaro, and the Mysterious Hand
item.description: The week of August 18, 2025: The economics of GLP-1s, Bolivia, the economy, tariffs, and much, much more.
